app.title: Liturgy Builder
dialog.shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
dialog.shortcuts.content:
Keyboard Shortcuts

ActionShortcut
File
New liturgyCtrl+N
Open liturgyCtrl+O
Save liturgyCtrl+S
Save asCtrl+Shift+S
ExportCtrl+E
Edit
Delete selectedDelete
Move upCtrl+Up
Move downCtrl+Down
Navigation
HelpF1

Tips

  • Double-click an item to edit it
  • Right-click for context menu
  • Drag and drop to reorder items
dialog.workflow.title: Weekly Workflow Guide
dialog.workflow.content:
Weekly Workflow Guide

Monday - Tuesday

  • Receive service order from pastor/worship leader
  • Open Liturgy Builder and create new liturgy (Ctrl+N)
  • Set service date and leader in Service Info panel
  • Add all elements in order: songs, readings, prayers, offerings
  • Save liturgy (Ctrl+S)

Wednesday

  • Review and verify all content
  • Check YouTube links (Tools > Check YouTube links)
  • Export links overview (.txt) for musicians
  • Share links file with worship team

Thursday - Friday

  • Make any adjustments based on feedback
  • Fill in any remaining fields (Edit all fields)
  • Verify all slides have content (no stubs)

Saturday

  • Final review of liturgy
  • Export PowerPoint (.pptx)
  • Export PDF bundle for musicians if needed
  • Update Excel register if configured
  • Test presentation on church computer

Sunday

  • Open exported PowerPoint
  • Run presentation during service

Best Practices

  • Keep song library organized by category
  • Update YouTube links when videos become unavailable
  • Use theme templates for consistent service structure
  • Train backup operators on the software
  • Back up liturgy files regularly
